memberdef.name: CHECK_TOOL_RETRIEVE
memberdef.initializer: ATH_MSG_VERBOSE("Try to retrieve " << #TOOLHANDLE); \ if( TOOLHANDLE.retrieve().isFailure()) { \ ATH_MSG_ERROR("Failed to retrieve tool " << #TOOLHANDLE); \ return StatusCode::FAILURE; \ }

memberdef.name: CHECK_TOOL_RETRIEVE_CONDITIONAL
memberdef.initializer: if( CONDITION) { \ ATH_MSG_VERBOSE("Try to retrieve " << #TOOLHANDLE); \ if(TOOLHANDLE.retrieve().isFailure()) { \ ATH_MSG_ERROR("Failed to retrieve tool " << #TOOLHANDLE); \ return StatusCode::FAILURE; \ } \ }
